mod: "        Fix CVE-2014-0050. Specially crafted input can trigger a DoS if the"
" buffer used by the MultipartStream is not big enough. When"
" buffer size by throwing an IllegalArgumentException if the"
"        requested buffer size is too small. This prevents the DoS."
"                        format("The boundary specified in the %s header is too long", CONTENT_TYPE), iae);"
"     * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the buffer size is too small"
